text: Monsters. () is a 2019 Romanian drama film directed and written by Marius Olteanu. It stars Judith State, Cristian Popa, Alexandru Potrocean, Șerban Pavlu and Dorina Lazăr. The plot is divided in three chapters and follows a day in the life of Dana (State) and Arthur (Popa), a childless married couple, who tries to understand their ongoing marital crisis. The film is the directorial debut of Olteanu. It premiered on February 9, 2019 at the 69th Berlin International Film Festival. It received generally positive reviews from film critics. == References == == External links == * Category:Romanian drama films Category:Romanian films Category:2019 drama films Category:Romanian-language films Category:Films set in Bucharest Category:2019 films Category:Gay-related films
title: Monsters.
